BRIEF-ITT Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.14 May 4 (Reuters) - ITT Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.73 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * RAISING MID-POINT OF ITS PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED 2018 FULL-YEAR ADJUSTED EPS GUIDANCE BY FIVE CENTS TO $3.05 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.73, REVENUE VIEW $684.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.09 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY ORGANIC ORDERS GREW 8 PERCENT EXCLUDING A LARGE PRIOR YEAR OIL AND GAS ORDER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
